subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Washington Redskins defensive end Jason Taylor was expected to miss 10 to 14 days with a sprained right knee, putting his availability in doubt for the opener Sept. 4 against the Giants. Coach Jim Zorn said tests showed no ligament damage.
snippet: Washington Redskins defensive end Jason Taylor was expected to miss 10 to 14 days with a sprained right knee, putting his availability in doubt for the opener Sept. 4 against the Giants. Coach Jim Zorn said tests showed no ligament damage.
